channel.title: Minecraft becomes #1 best selling PC game of all time
channel.description:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_best-selling_PC_games#List
Crazy. Just seems like yesterday I bought the Alpha.

item.source: Minecraft becomes #1 best selling PC game of all time

item.title: Minecraft becomes #1 best selling PC game of all time
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“naseem142, post:9, topic:544753”]Wait? Diablo 3 is in third place? I thought people didn’t like it? I really like it though, It’s just what i heard.[/quote]It had huge hype around it and lots of preorder goodness, as well as huge launchday events where people were buying them up left and right. And most people enjoyed it at first anyway, it just died down really fast.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @xEthanx xEthanx
item.description:
@xEthanx wrote:

Minecraft beta 1.5 was my favorite.

But yeah it is crazy how immensely it grew, I kind of miss the days when it was a more humble game though to be completely honest.
